summary: Provides mixin functionality to load, fuse, unfuse, save, and retrieve LoRA (low‑rank adaptation) weights for the CogVideoX transformer model, streamlining integration of LoRA layers into the video generation architecture.
business_intent: Facilitates rapid customization and fine‑tuning of CogVideoX video generation models by handling LoRA weight management, enabling developers to efficiently adapt and deploy enhanced models for specialized video generation tasks.
